text:
Divergent thinking is incredible for three reasons:

1) It starts with stepping back from your life and your field to evaluate what is working and what isn’t and being able to plan accordingly with new perspectives.

2) Divergent thinking eliminates a persons ego and forces them to ask themselves, “what could I possibly be missing that could be added or layered here?”

3) You get to take a break from your own brain — sorry I stole that from you, Tom.

thanks for showing us that you don’t need a million-dollar budget or a room full of geniuses to encourage deeper thinking!
title: Divergent thinking is incredible for three reasons: 1) It starts with stepping back from your life…

text:
One clap, two clap, three clap, forty?

By clapping more or less, you can signal to us which stories really stand out.
title: How Computers Can Tell What They’re Looking At – Hiroyuki Takayama –
